name: Rounded UI (LTT)
description: This plugin adds rounded corners to the LTT Forum like the UI on Samsung phones. If you see any problems PM @Sombra on the forum. I have no idea how it performs on dark theme or mixed with other themes so let me know if there are any issues.
additional_info:
V1 - Release
V1.1 - Fixed Header
V1.2 - Fixed Profile
V1.3 - A previous fix broke something more important so I undid that. :P
V1.4 - Various Fixes
